url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Octopus/Blue-Ringed

sections.name: Special Abilities
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Octopus/Blue-Ringed/Special Abilities

sections.body: While within water, an octopus can emit a 5-foot-radius sphere of ink once per minute as a swift action. This ink provides total concealment and persists for 1 minute.
sections.name: Ink Cloud
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Octopus/Blue-Ringed/Special Abilities/Ink Cloud

sections.body: The octopus can jet 60 feet in a straight line as a full-round action. This does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Jet
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Octopus/Blue-Ringed/Special Abilities/Jet

sections.body: Bite—injury; save Fort DC 10; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1 Str; cure 1 save.
sections.name: Poison
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Octopus/Blue-Ringed/Special Abilities/Poison

sections.body: Blue-ringed octopuses are aquatic animals capable of a surprising amount of cunning. They cannot survive out of water.

name: Familiar, Octopus, Blue-Ringed
